ComicInfo.Summary:
Somehow Anthony Zane has killed top assassin, Smash Brannagan. Now he has 72 hours to prove that he is a worthy replacement… and his fate will be decided in THE OCTAGON.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover A | Arturo Mesa | 1 | B | Movie Poster Cover B | Arturo Mesa | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover C | Bill McKay | 3 | D | "Lord Ellington" Interlocking Cover D | Arturo Mesa | 4 | E | "Agent Cinco" Interlocking Cover E | Arturo Mesa | 5 | Note: Covers D and E interlock with 5 covers to be released throughout the first arc to form an Infinite Seven Poster!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 15:59:01. [CVDB584970]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Cinco, Anthony Zane, Lars Wolfsberg, Lord Ellington, Master Zhen, Sherlock Moriarty, Washington
